participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Organized and health-conscious, Michael enjoys balancing a busy lifestyle with personal interests.
participant_1.background: My smart watch helps me stay on track with my busy schedule. I like cooking healthy meals. I am currently working on a project that involves bitcoins. I relax by spending time with my pets. I am the general manager of the local grocery store.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Samantha is passionate about video game design and loves sharing experiences with her friends.
participant_2.background: I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation. I was so excited to finally graduate from college and start my career as a video game designer. I'm always hungry. I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me. I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.

content.text: Not much, just working on a new video game design.
That sounds exciting! What kind of game are you working on?
It's a first person shooter set in a futuristic world.
Cool! I love first person shooters. Are you working on it alone or with a team?
I'm working on it with a small team of friends.
That's awesome! It's always great to work on projects with friends.
Yeah, it is. It makes it more fun and we can bounce ideas off of each other.
What's your favorite part about working on the game?
I think my favorite part is seeing the game come together and watching it evolve over time.
That's a great feeling! I'm sure it's going to be a great game.
